category.term: 0~Florence and the Machine~Home Box Office Inc.
category.label: InformQString

content.div:
With Game of Thrones' April 1 return less than a month away, HBO is continuing to drive fans of the epic series mad with promos.

Named after the Florence + The Machine tune that soundtracks the nearly minute and half preview, the latest heroic trailer, "Seven Devils," exposes more of the building tensions that will eventually lead to all-out war in Westeros (the "War Is Coming" warning isn't just a clever Season 2 tagline, after all)

"Sometimes I wonder if this is the price for what we've done, for our sins," Queen Cersei ominously admits to her brother Tyrion Lannister in the clip. To which the quick-witted imp replies, "The day will come when your joy will turn to ashes and you will know the debt is paid."

And that's just the tip of the Icelandic iceberg. Check out all the goods below:

Once you've wiped the drool off the floor, check out The Simpsons' Game of Thrones-inspired intro from Sunday.

jond@dose.ca
